description:
Since Betfair was launched in June 2000 it has become the largest betting/trading exchange in the world!

With this Course, you will know Betfair inside out and you will start trading Betfair markets with confidence.

In the First Section of this course we will know What is Betfair, what is a Back and a Lay, what is in-play trading and why Winners always welcome!

The Second Section focuses on The Essentials: Requirements, Personal and Account Details, Managing Your Account and Choosing Your Market.

Section Three introduces Your First Bet/Trade, Doing the Maths and Betting/Trading In-Play.

In Section Four we study Low-Risk and Automated Strategies, Going Pro and Problem Gambling.

Finally, in Section Five we learn Common Mistakes, Top Tips and The Most Amazing Markets.

ENROLL NOW and kick-start your Betfair Trading journey!

I'll see you inside!
title: Trading Betfair Sport Exchange Market - How to Get Started
